trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> 对象的类型转换器，经过考虑，该转换器没有类型转换路径。

trans-unit.source: The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
trans-unit.target: 类型转换器强制执行并报告该行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>类型不应使用类型转换器途径来转换值。

trans-unit.source: You should use markup extensions instead.
trans-unit.target: 应改为使用标记扩展。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 为此，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>方法始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法始终引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 异常可能可能报告无效的输入，但即使都被视为有效的输入将导致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可使用指定上下文，将指定类型的对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>类型不应使用类型转换器途径来转换 （应改用标记扩展） 的值。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 为此，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>方法始终返回`false`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法始终引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="sourceType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="sourceType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要进行计算以供转换的类型。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否可使用指定的上下文将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" /> 的实例转换为指定类型。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>类型不应使用类型转换器途径来转换 （应改用标记扩展） 的值。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 一种格式上下文，可提供有关要从中调用此转换器的环境的信息。

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: 特定于区域性的信息。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用指定上下文将指定对象转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey" />。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均引发异常。

trans-unit.target: 不能执行转换。
